data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=E290lmufiyIQ7kNvgH__CwT&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCwcV5I9ZXhpq0e2IgkwW1PJd2xxxn4uGkR1e7uIJBDpA&oe=66D99437)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=THaPUkiZRtYQ7kNvgErtlea&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDM9EZGKyf3wCI-EdWwBYgbT82ZNWeWBlu2LjEP1GphHQ&oe=66D9A1D2)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=euem7RhxcrgQ7kNvgH1vhpX&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCgtoR-VrOoV4GGuzuH9RAMksSf9qVfCmWGA7Lqi1F8DQ&oe=66D98D09)
